name: Wheat Rush
description:
You are an owner of a failed bank ,and have to pay off millions of people. You now need to gather wheat like your life depends on it because you will have lots of debt to pay. 

As the amount of wheat you need to gather increases each day, you must upgrade yourself to satisfy the demand. Use money collected to become faster, improve wheat money, and increase range of collecting wheat. Run through the wheat fields with full hands ,and never look back.

Made for the Juice Jam 2! Made with c++ , and Win32.
